services.name: carboncredits-backend
services.startCommand: python3 -c "import http.server; import socketserver; import json; class Handler(http.server.SimpleHTTPRequestHandler): def do_GET(self): path = self.path; response = {'error': 'Not found'}; status_code = 404; if path == '/' or path == '': response = {'message': 'Carbon Credit API is running'}; status_code = 200; elif path == '/health': response = {'status': 'healthy'}; status_code = 200; self.send_response(status_code); self.send_header('Content-type', 'application/json'); self.end_headers(); self.wfile.write(json.dumps(response).encode()); def log_message(self, format, *args): pass; PORT = int('$PORT') if '$PORT' else 10000; print(f'Server starting on port {PORT}'); socketserver.TCPServer(('', PORT), Handler).serve_forever()"
